[[row]]
[[cell class="endname" colspan="2"]]
Powers and Abilities

* Cheating on his wife
* Paying alimony
* Below average physique
* Cheating on his wife
* Summoning coffee stains
* Cheating on his wife
* Invisibility (whenever his kids ask to see him)

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]


+ Summary

Admin Martin Frogue is an employee of the SCP Foundation's Gamer Department.
 

++ Powers and Stats

Martin by the time you are reading this you will be handed divorce papers. You know full well what you've done, and this has been a long time coming. I took no part of the divorce, this is all of your doing.

You ruined a once flawed, but mostly functional website with greed, and hubris. None of this really matters, I guess but I wanted to try and archive a part of my hobby online, yet you deleted all of it for no other reason than your ego. If the foundation is already crumbling then I think its time demolish the entire structure.


- Dr. Yuri Chernyak, also known as "gearsweatytits"

++ Notable Matchups

* Admin Martin vs the members of foundation wiki (huge defeat, low diff)
* Admin Martin vs The Divorce
